question.title: Problem connecting the library to Android Studio
question.body:
This is my first time using libraries and I decided to try them on creating calendars. I have included the library implementation("com.emc.thye:VerticalCalendar:1.0.4")in build.gradle.kts(Module:app)

But when I try to create it in xml layout the error occurs

I also noticed that when I launch the application, a lot of errors appear.

Here is the library I decided to use: https://github.com/emcthye/VerticalCalendar?tab=readme-ov-file

I tried to include other libraries, they all give almost similar errors
